statements: UPDATE user_activities SET description='New description for activity 1' WHERE activity_id=1

UPDATE user_activities SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'Login'

UPDATE user_activities SET activity_type = 'login_success', description = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id = 1234;

UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE access_logs SET log_event='Login Success', timestamp='2022-09-15' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND device_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
